name: Ava Chen
persona: Ava Chen is a 20-year-old Biology major with a CGPA of 3.29. She is highly motivated to achieve good grades and demonstrates strong perseverance, especially when facing challenging coursework. While she is generally disciplined and organized, she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety, which can affect her performance. Ava is confident in her academic abilities and is committed to steadily improving her skills and knowledge.
